dcterms:description: Argoverse 2.0 is a long-range detection dataset that provides LiDAR point clouds and object annotations up to Â±150m, collected in six US cities, and labels 26 semantic classes for the 3D detection task.
dcterms:title: Argoverse 2.0

dcterms:description: KITTI is a benchmark suite for evaluating computer vision algorithms in the context of autonomous driving, providing various datasets including stereo, optical flow, visual odometry, and 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving that includes 3D object detection and tracking, providing data from various sensors including LiDAR and cameras.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:description: Waymo is an open dataset for autonomous driving that focuses on scalability in perception, providing high-quality LiDAR and camera data for 3D object detection.
dcterms:title: Waymo
